cityOfLiterature.siteDescription: On 31 October, UNESCO included Bremen in the international network of Creative Cities and awarded it the title "City of Literature". This makes Bremen the seventh creative city in Germany to be honoured by the world cultural organisation.
cityOfLiterature.intro: Since 31 October 2023, it has been clear that Bremen may permanently bear the UNESCO title of "City of Literature" and thus belongs to both the illustrious "City of Literature" network and the much larger Creative Cities Network (consisting of around 350 cities worldwide).
cityOfLiterature.background: The UNESCO Creative Cities programme has existed since 2004 and today connects cities worldwide that share their experiences, strategies, ideas and good practice in the field of contemporary art and culture. Members of the network are centres of excellence in one of seven areas: film, music, design, gastronomy, media arts, crafts and literature.

SEO.title: kulturfinder.sh
SEO.description: The kulturfinder.sh is a new app that enables users to find cultural institutions in Schleswig-Holstein on their mobile devices. It uses to geodata to show users a map of nearby insitutions. A photo and description are included for  each institution as well as the address and information about other services.
SEO.commonKeywords: Kulturfinder, culture, app, Schleswig-Holstein, Kultursphäre, digital, digitisation, Living Images, kulturfinder.sh, cultural institution

about.description: kultursphäre.sh is a project by the media department of Kiel University of Applied Sciences. The project is funded by the Ministry of Education, Training, Science, Research and Culture of the state of Schleswig-Holstein. In cooperation with digiCULT and the Schleswig-Holstein State Library.
about.noThirdParties: The use of this app is usually possible without providing personal data. Data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent.
about.matomoDescription: Web analysis is used to evaluate the flow of visitors to our online offer and can include behavior, interests or demographic information about the visitors. With the help of this analysis, we can, for example, recognize at what time our online offer or its functions or content are used most often and understand which areas need to be optimized. For these purposes, so-called anonymized user data can be created and saved in a file (cookie) or similar processes can be used for the same purpose. For this information, e.g. content viewed, websites visited and elements and technical information used there, such as the browser used, the computer system used and information on times and locations of use. IP addresses are stored pseudonymized by shortening the IP address (IP masking) to protect users. No identifiable user data is saved. The information generated by the cookie about your use of this website is only saved on our server and not passed on to third parties.
about.matomoDescription2: You have the option at any time to object to the range analysis with future effect. In this case, a so-called opt-out cookie is stored in your browser, which means that Matomo no longer collects any session data. If users delete their cookies, however, this means that the opt-out cookie is also deleted and must therefore be reactivated by the users.
about.legalNoticeDescription: If we ask the users for their consent to the use of third-party providers, the legal basis for processing data is consent. Otherwise, the data of the users are processed on the basis of our legitimate interests (i.e. interest in efficient, economical and recipient-friendly services). In this context, we would also like to draw your attention to the information on the use of cookies in this data protection declaration.
about.legalNoticePoint0: Service provider: web analysis / range measurement in self-hosting
about.legalNoticePoint1: Processed data types: usage data (e.g. visited websites, interest in content, access times), meta / communication data (e.g. device information, IP addresses).
about.legalNoticePoint2: Affected persons: users (e.g. website visitors, users of online services).
about.legalNoticePoint3: Purposes of processing: range measurement (e.g. access statistics, recognition of returning visitors), tracking (e.g. interest / behavior-related profiling, use of cookies), visit action evaluation, profiling (creating user profiles).
about.legalNoticePoint4: Security measures: IP masking (pseudonymization of the IP address).
about.legalNoticePoint5: Deletion of data: The cookies have a maximum storage period of 13 months
about.legalNoticePoint6: Opposition option (opt-out): Users can object to the processing of their data by Matomo at any time with future effect. In this case, a so-called opt-out cookie is stored in your browser, which means that Matomo no longer collects any session data. If users delete their cookies, however, this means that the opt-out cookie is also deleted and must therefore be reactivated by the users.
about.legalNoticePoint7: Legal basis: consent (Art. 6 Para. 1 Clause 1 a) GDPR), legitimate interests (Art. 6 Para. 1 Clause 1 lit. GDPR).
about.legalNoticeProducedBy: Created with the help of the free Datenschutz-Generator.de by Dr. Thomas Schwenke.

hb.imprint3: Dataport ist eine Anstalt des öffentlichen Rechts. Sie wird vertreten durch den Vorstand:
hb.privacy00: 1) Welche Daten werden erfasst und wie werden sie verwendet?
hb.privacy02: In unseren Server Log Files speichern wir Informationen, die Ihr Browser automatisch aus technischen Gründen an uns übermittelt. Dies sind:
hb.privacy14: Diese protokollierten Daten werden von uns für folgende Zwecke verwendet:
hb.privacy15: Zur technischen Administration und zur Bereitstellung unserer Website.
hb.privacy17: zur Abwehr von Angriffsversuchen auf unseren Webserver,
hb.privacy19: zur Weitergabe bzw. Auskunftserteilung gegenüber staatlichen Stellen,
hb.privacy20: zur Weitergabe bzw. Auskunftserteilung gegenüber Inhabern von Urheber- und Leistungsschutzrechten.
hb.privacy21: Verlaufsdaten sowie Protokolldaten (Logdateien) werden automatisch nach 30 Tagen gelöscht.
hb.privacy23: Diese Datenschutzerklärung gilt nur für den Server von Dataport. Auf den Servern, zu denen die externen Links führen, kann es eine andere Datenschutzerklärung (Privacy Policy) geben. Um diese zu überprüfen, sollten Sie die Startseite/Homepage des jeweiligen Angebots aufsuchen und sich bei Bedarf direkt an den jeweiligen Anbieter wenden. Dataport übernimmt keine Verantwortung für die Inhalte oder für die Privacy Policies der externen Anbieter.
hb.privacy25: Ihre Daten werden grundsätzlich in Deutschland und ausschließlich in unserem eigenen Rechenzentrum verarbeitet.
hb.privacy27: Zum Schutz Ihrer Daten vor unberechtigtem Zugriff und Missbrauch haben wir umfangreiche technische und betriebliche Sicherheitsvorkehrungen nach Maßgabe der europäischen Datenschutz-Grundverordnung und nach dem Landesdatenschutzgesetz Schleswig-Holstein getroffen. Das von uns betriebene Rechenzentrum ist vom Bundesamt für Sicherheit in der Informationstechnik (BSI) nach dem Standard BSI-Grundschutz zertifiziert.
hb.privacy28: 5) Welche Rechte habe ich in Bezug auf meine Daten?
hb.privacy29: Sie können im Rahmen der gesetzlichen Voraussetzungen Auskunft über Ihre von uns gespeicherten personenbezogenen Daten oder deren Berichtigung, Sperrung oder Löschung von uns verlangen. Verwenden Sie dafür bitte unser

about.positionRelatedDataProcessing: When in use, the app can access your location if you have granted it permission to do so in your device’s settings. Different technology is used to determine a person's location, e.g. IP address or GPS data. This data is processed exclusively on your device.

accessibility.LBGG_BITV: The kulturfinder.sh team makes every effort to ensure that the kulturfinder.sh website is accessible to everyone in compliance with the Act on Equal Treatment for people with disabilities in Schleswig-Holstein (LBGG) and the Barrier-Free Informational Technology Ordinance (BITV). This accessibility statement applies to the entire web presence of kulturfinder.sh.
accessibility.currentStatus: The website is partially compliant with the BITV. “Good accessibility” is guaranteed. Deficiencies were found in the accessibility of the following areas; these deficiencies are not compatible with the legal guidelines:

faults.0: Consistency of the navigation: The navigation is not always consistent, thus making it difficult to understand.
faults.1: Plain language: Explanations about the page and instructions for using it are not available in plain language.

accessibility.correcting: Improvements are planned to make it more accessible.
accessibility.declarationCreated: This statement was created on 04/12/2020 based on a self-assessment carried out on 04/12/2020.
accessibility.feedbackExplanation: If you have any questions about the implementation of accessibility or have noticed deficiencies related to the compliance with accessibility requirements, please contact us using the contact details provided on this website.
accessibility.complaintsOfficeExplanation: If you believe that you have been disadvantaged by the lack of accessibility, you can contact the complaints department of Schleswig-Holstein:

complaintsOffice.name: Complaints department for barriers to information from public offices on the internet

licenses.oss-third-party: Open Source licenses from third parties
licenses.author: Author:

noData.notDownloadable: Unfortunately, our database is currently offline. We would kindly ask for your patience. Please try again later. We're working on it!

pwaBanner.iosPwaClaim: Information about cultural institutions at your fingertips, including offline.

pwaModal.title: Install app
pwaModal.text: You can download and install the kulturfinder app. You can then use the app offline, let you find cultural institutions at any time straight from your home screen.

windows.step1: 1. Click on the plus icon on the address bar.
windows.step2: 2. Then click on the blue button.

mac.step1: 1. Open the menu and click on 'Install kulturfinder.sh...' or click on the plus icon on the address bar..
mac.step2: 2. Then click on the blue button.

noGPS.title: GPS is disabled
noGPS.description: Enable GPS to receive helpful information.
noGPS.howToHandle: Location services are not enabled on your device.
noGPS.howToHandle2: Please check your device settings and refresh this website to use the location services on kulturfinder.sh.

noNetwork.title: No internet connection
noNetwork.description: We are currently unable to retrieve any information; please check your internet connection.

signLanguageModal.title: Explanation video in sign language
signLanguageModal.noVideo: Unfortunately, your browser does not support this video format. Try updating your browser to watch the sign language video.

details.noDescription: We're sorry. The description is not available in all languages yet. We're working on it.
details.shareSubject: Check out what I have found for you in the culture finder app kulturfinder.sh:
details.routeViaNavigationApp: Show route in the map application
details.noOpeningHours: We do not have any information about the opening hours for this institution. Please check the institution's website.
details.closedHolidays: Closed on the following public holidays
details.coronaWarningText: Opening hours may differ due to the coronavirus pandemic. Please check the institution’s website for more information.
details.coronaWarningTextDecember: Most cultural institutions are temporarily closed. Please check the institution's website for more information.
details.noGuarantee: No guarantee for the accuracy of the opening hours. On public holidays, in particular, they can vary. Please also check the institution's website.
details.livingImagesDescription: Find our interactive pictures and bring them to life!
details.livingImagesCallToAction: Bring Living Images to life now!
details.livingImagesIOSWebAppWrongVersion: Unfortunately, your operating system does not support the Living Images. Please update your iOS version.
details.livingImagesIsDesktop: You need a mobile device to view the Living Images.
details.livingImagesNotSupported: Unfortunately, our Living Images are not supported by your browser.
details.feedbackIntro: Have you got any comments or feedback about the app? Please contact our team at kulturfinder.sh. We look forward to hearing from you!
details.feedbackInstitutionHeadline: Would you like to contact the institution directly?
details.feedbackInstitutionText: For questions or enquiries, please contact the institution. You will find the details in the 'contact' section on the institution's page.
details.feedbackWrongOpeningHoursText: Despite taking the utmost care, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of the opening hours. Especially on public holidays, they can vary, or they may change several times a year depending on the season. We apologise for any inconvenience this may cause and would be grateful if you could inform us of any mistakes we have made. Thank you!

museumscard.description: From 6 June to 17 November you have free admission to over 130 museums in Schleswig-Holstein! This applies to all under 18s and holders of a Juleica.
museumscard.nahverkehr: On 24 and 31 October, your MuseumsCard is valid as a ticket (for anyone under 18 or with a Juleica) on all local trains, 2nd class, in Schleswig-Holstein as well as Hamburg Altona and Hamburg Hbf and on scheduled buses in Schleswig-Holstein.
museumscard.description2: The MuseumsCard is an initiative of the Ministry of Education, Science, Research and Culture of the State of Schleswig-Holstein and the Savings Banks and Giro Association of Schleswig-Holstein in cooperation with the Landesjugendring Schleswig-Holstein and the Museumsverband Schleswig-Holstein und Hamburg. Another cooperation partner is Nahverkehr Schleswig-Holstein.
